Paragraph: This missense mutation , which replaces Ala with Thr , is frequent among FNDI patients and is thought to reduce the efficiency of cleavage by signal peptidases . .

Note: FNDI stands for Fanconi-Bickel Disease, which is a rare genetic disorder. I made this assumption based on the context provided in the paragraph.
